TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectRootElement extends Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer

summary.span: Represents an MSBuild project, a targets file, or any other file that conforms to MSBuild project file schema.

span.span: Represents an MSBuild project, a targets file, or any other file that conforms to MSBuild project file schema.

summary.span: This class and its related classes allow a complete MSBuild project or targets file to be read and written.

span.span: This class and its related classes allow a complete MSBuild project or targets file to be read and written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注释和空白区域不能通过编辑此模型目前。Comments and white space cannot be edited through this model at present. 每个项目根元素都与一个项目集合关联。Each project root element is associated with exactly one project collection. 这样能够控制其生存期内并不会对感到惊讶通过来自另一个项目集合的编辑该项目集合的所有者。This allows the owner of that project collection to control its lifetime and not be surprised by edits that come from another project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportElement AddImport(string project) cil managed
Public Function AddImport (project As String) As ProjectImportElement

param.name: project
param.span: The project to be imported.

span.span: The project to be imported.

summary.span: Adds a project import to this project.

span.span: Adds a project import to this project.
Returns the added project import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果导入组存在，则会将项目导入插入不具有任何条件属性，则最后一个导入组否则，在项目的末尾创建导入。If import groups exist, inserts the project import into the last import group that has no Condition attribute; otherwise, creates an import at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportGroupElement AddImportGroup() cil managed

summary.span: Creates an import group at the end of this project.

span.span: Creates an import group at the end of this project.

returns.span: Returns the import group created at the end of this project.

span.span: Returns the import group created at the end of this project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此便利方法，通过选取基于启发 MSBuild DOM 中的位置。This convenience method picks a location in the MSBuild DOM based on a heuristic.

summary.span: Adds an item to this project.

span.span: Adds an item to this project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String) As ProjectItemElement

param.name: itemType
param.span: The item type of the item to be added.

span.span: The item type of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

summary.span: Adds an item to this project.

span.span: Adds an item to this project.
Returns the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后添加到具有的条件属性的项组和相同的项类型的至少一个项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果不找到任何此类项组，则创建新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含的值排序。Items are ordered by Include values. 如果项匹配的现有的通配符表达式进行此项类型，则没有任何效果。Does nothing if the item matches an existing wildcard expression for this item type.

param.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

param.name: metadata
param.span: The metadata to be added.

span.span: The metadata to be added.

summary.span: Adds an item with metadata to this project.

span.span: Adds an item with metadata to this project.
Returns the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后添加到具有的条件属性的项组和相同的项类型的至少一个项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果不找到任何此类项组，则创建新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含的值排序。Items are ordered by Include values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后添加到具有的条件属性的项组和相同的项类型的至少一个项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果不找到任何此类项组，则创建新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含的值排序。Items are ordered by Include values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemDefinitionGroupElement AddItemDefinitionGroup() cil managed

summary.span: Adds an item definition group to this project.

span.span: Adds an item definition group to this project.

returns.span: Returns the added item definition group.

span.span: Returns the added item definition group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建并后的最后一个现有项定义组，将项定义组，如果有的话。Creates and adds an item definition group after the last existing item definition group, if any. 否则，最后一个现有属性组中之后, 创建的项定义组如果有的话。Otherwise, creates an item definition group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果属性组不存在，请在项目的末尾创建一个新的项定义组。If no property group exists, creates a new item definition group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement AddItemGroup() cil managed

summary.span: Creates and adds an item group to this project.

span.span: Creates and adds an item group to this project.
Returns the added item group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建并后的最后一个的现有项组，将项组，如果有的话。Creates and adds an item group after the last existing item group, if any. 否则，最后一个现有属性组中之后, 创建的项组如果有的话。Otherwise, creates an item group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果属性组不存在，请在项目的末尾创建一个新的项组。If no property group exists, creates a new item group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyElement AddProperty(string name, string value) cil managed
Public Function AddProperty (name As String, value As String) As ProjectPropertyElement

param.name: name
param.span: The name of the property to be updated or added.

span.span: The name of the property to be updated or added.

param.name: value
param.span: The value of the property to be updated or added.

span.span: The value of the property to be updated or added.

summary.span: Updates or adds a property to this project.

span.span: Updates or adds a property to this project.

returns.span: Returns the updated or added property.

span.span: Returns the updated or added property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定更新的最后一个的现有属性`name`本身或包含它的属性组上具有的条件属性。Updates the last existing property with the specified `name` that has no Condition attribute on itself or on the property group that contains it. 否则为创建一个属性，并将其添加到没有 Condition 特性的第一个属性组。Otherwise, creates a property and adds it to the first property group that has no Condition attribute. 如果此类属性组不存在之后的最后一个现有属性组中，, 创建属性组，如果有的话，并将属性添加到它。If no such property group exists, creates a property group after the last existing property group, if any, and adds the property to it . 否则为创建并将属性组添加到项目，开始且将属性添加到它。Otherwise, creates and adds a property group to the start of the project, and adds the property to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyGroupElement AddPropertyGroup() cil managed

summary.span: Adds a new property group to this project.

span.span: Adds a new property group to this project.
Returns the added property group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建属性组并将其添加后的最后一个现有属性组中，如果有的话。Creates a property group and adds it after the last existing property group, if any. 否则，将属性组添加到项目开始。Otherwise, adds the property group to the start of the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要设置的值是空字符串或 null，则删除 ToolsVersion 特性。Removes the ToolsVersion attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要设置的值是空字符串或 null，则删除 TreatAsLocalProperty 属性。Removes the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null. 有关详细信息`TreatAsLocalProperty`属性，请参阅[Project 元素 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653)和[如何： 生成不同的选项相同的源文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d14f1212-ddd9-434f-b138-f840011b0fb2)。For more information about the `TreatAsLocalProperty` attribute, see [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) and [How to: Build the Same Source Files with Different Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d14f1212-ddd9-434f-b138-f840011b0fb2).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement TryOpen(string path) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryOpen (path As String) As ProjectRootElement

param.name: path
param.span: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.

span.span: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.

summary.span: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

span.span: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

summary.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.

span.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.
Returns the project root.

returns.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

span.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 要纳入内存并且由于内存压力而被丢弃。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 返回 null 而不表示，项目根永远不会加载后，仅，该文件当前不在内存中。If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

span.span: Gets the project root in the specified project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

summary.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.

span.span: or null if it is not currently in memory.
Returns the project root.

returns.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

span.span: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 要纳入内存并且由于内存压力而被丢弃。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 返回 null 而不表示，项目根永远不会加载后，仅，该文件当前不在内存中。If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the version number of this object.

span.span: Gets the version number of this object.

value.span: 返回此对象的版本号。

span.span: Returns the version number of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较此版本号与存储的版本号来确定是否已更改项目的 XML 内容，即使在更改后保存项目。Compare this version number to a stored version number to determine whether the project XML content has changed, even if the project is saved after the change. 编辑可能不止一次，递增版本号，因此仅很版本对存储的值进行比较。An edit may increment the version number more than once, so Version should only be compared to a stored value.
